price: Hakika hii ndiyo riziki yetu isiyo malizika.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزۡقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ
footnotes: Hakika haya bila ya shaka ni tunayo yatoa Sisi, na wala hayana ukomo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā lariz'qunā mā lahu min nafādin
